Reviews.Title: Perfect example of why technology has shifted
Reviews.Author: RealWorld
Reviews.Content: I have had this for a few months now and admit it was a terrible decision. I don't like to text from the phone because it takes too long. I don't like to talk from this phone because you can't hear well.

Reviews.Title: did not know i could replace older phone and am thrilled and I had 2 people ask me how they could get one
Reviews.Author: cl "cl"
Reviews.Content: I had not wanted to replace my badly battered older phone because I wanted one just like it and i did not want a smart phone that would involve more money on monthly bill.

Reviews.Title: not working
Reviews.Author: masonp6191
Reviews.Content: The phone doesn't work I ordered another phone but can I get my money back and I believe you should let me know if it wasn't going to work thanks and have a nice day

Reviews.Title: So-So
Reviews.Author: Tsuky
Reviews.Content: Fulfilled my need for a quick cheap phone.  However, 9 key does not work correctly when texting.  In fair shape.
